sermons.title: 30 - Testimony of Some of God's Workers
A Testimony Of God's Working And The Call To The Work
sermons.description: Brother Merle shares about the working of the Lord in his local area. This message is a call to pray for the gathering of believers in local areas that would be used in revival for God's work. He calls us to personal revival and then to go forward in God's work to a lost and dying world without Christ and the testimony of His bride.

sermons.title: Dr. Orr's Testimony
sermons.description: This message was preached at a 1982 pastor's gathering. J. Edwin Orr shares his testimony and you will quickly realize how this revival historian could speak so sweetly of revivals from the past. It is because he experienced mighty revivals as a youth as he traveled the world by faith in the living God.

sermons.title: Finding Light in Darkness
sermons.description: We are called to be a vibrant testimony. As Christians we bear the life and light of Jesus in earthen vessels. We must allow Godâ€™s word to become our value system. Determine to make the choice to speak and act in a manner that represents who Christ is. God will give you power and light to shine in dark times.

sermons.title: Friday #1 Dr. Orr's Personal Testimony
sermons.description: This series was delivered by Dr. Orr in February of 1983 at Wallace Memorial Presbyterian Church. It was a series that he himself regarded as a good summary of his teaching and ministry. On most evenings Dr. Orr began with a lecture on the history of revival, then concluded with a message on the Biblical understanding and preparation for revival.

sermons.title: From the Alley to the Highway
sermons.description: Brother Frye gives his testimony, from a false conversion & a life entangled in the southern rock & country music industry. His humility and brokenness is particularly moving in the lead-in & exiting songs.

sermons.title: Guide Posts and Warning Signs
sermons.description: You will be blessed listening as Paul Washer shares from what he calls his "life verses". This is a rich sermon full of truth that can be summed up with the message that knowledge of Christ is more important than anything.

sermons.title: He Lives In Me
sermons.description: Carter Conlon's testimony!!!

sermons.title: His Testimony And Conversion
sermons.description: A very powerful testimony of conversion not by a man but by God who wrought a wonderful work of regeneration in mr. campbells soul. He recieved the baptism with the Holy Spirit and was used powerfully in the revival of 1921. Then he went through a barren wilderness for 17 years in the ministry. But again God revived his heart and he experienced the outpouring of the Holy Spirit in the famous Hebrides Revival. The summation of this testimony is very powerful where he asks the listener if God could do this for him why not us? are we willing to 'go through with God' at any cost?

sermons.title: How God Called Me To A World-Wide Ministry
Introducing Brother Yun
sermons.description: Setting the scene for Brother Yun and Brother Xu, their interpreter introduces the Back to Jerusalem mission - sending thousands of Chinese missions across the world to fulfill the great commission.

sermons.title: Is Your Life a Compelling Testimony
Jealous for the Testimony of the Lord
sermons.description: Brother Denny Kenaston has been diagnosed with stage 4 cancer of the brain. He came back on April 22, 2012 to a church he planted to share the burden of the Lord with them. He confessed many of his failures and sins over the years and humbled himself before the body of Christ.

sermons.title: Just One Person: George Street
sermons.description: What can "just one person" do? Listen to this incredible true story of how God worked in a little place called George Street... (Worth the listen—only 9 minutes.)

sermons.title: K-468 A Wandering Jew Comes Home
sermons.description: An early expression of Art’s testimony.  Timeless in its application for a yet future remnant of Israel in their final journey of travail before reaching home.  Circa 1973 message.

sermons.title: Kirk Cameron Testimony
sermons.description: Kirk Cameron shares a bit of personal testimony of how he came to know the Lord Jesus Christ, and then shared the burden of his heart, appealing to his audience to examine whether they be a true believer or not.  Ray Comfort teaches a good bit of the time the priceless principles of biblical evangelism--the need for the law to expose sin and its preparation for the heart for the grace of the gospel.

sermons.title: My Early Life as an Infidel
My Experience As A Chaplain - Part 1
My Experience As A Chaplain - Part 2
My Testimony: How I Became A Christian
Nicky Cruz Testimony
sermons.description: This is one of the most powerful testimonies of our modern age. Nicky Cruz, a hardened violent street kid in New York City and leader of the dreaded Mau Mau gang, encounters Jesus Christ and experiences a radical change in his once dark and hopeless life. This is his story, his progression from unloved child to being alone on the streets of NY, to gang leader and then meeting David Wilkerson, and finally, being apprehended by the Lord Jesus Christ who wrought a powerful and amazing conversion in his heart. A must hear!

sermons.title: Personal Testimony
sermons.description: This testimony is very intimate and powerful. Keith Daniel makes himself bare showing how the Lord brought him from darkness to light. This has to be one of the most powerful testimonies I have ever heard and it brought me to tears. He also gives some strong calls to Christians to follow and desire to read the bible and pray to God more. This message will strengthen and encourage you in your walk with Christ.

sermons.title: Personal Testimony and Repentance
sermons.description: Great opening part where Dr. Orr speaks of his early ministry in Belfast and his start on the "Can God" tour. Arrived in Liverpool with 65 cents, a change of clothes, and a bicycle (testimony to 29:29). In developing the theme of repentance, Dr. Orr does not follow the basic outline used in the message "The First Word of the Gospel." Instead, he focuses on the call to repentance found in the letters to the seven churches in Revelation 2-3.

sermons.title: Purpose, Principles, and The Person: A Personal Testimony
Sleepers Awakened short testimony of a Hypocrite Preacher brought to Repentance by brother Mark
Testimony - Part 1
sermons.description: The audio quality isn't the best, but if you have patience to listen carefully to it, I found it to be very edifying. It sounds like Pat Robertson is interviewing Corrie Ten Boom about details of when she was in a concentration camp. It is incredibly interesting because she talks about being able to lead many Jews to trust in Jesus as their Savior before they died in the camps.

sermons.title: Testimony - Part 1
sermons.description: A marvelous testimony of God's power through a woman who had committed her life to her Saviour. From the 1930's to 1940's, the Lord led her to face WWII and communism in Northern China, where she saved over a 100 orphans. After China fell to the communists, the Lord led her to the islands of Hong Kong and Taiwan, where the love He put in her heart for the Chinese and lost children continued until her death in 1970. Through her stories, she encourages all believers to completely give their entire beings to God and see what He can do with such a life entrusted to Him.

sermons.title: Testimony - Part 1
sermons.description: A beautiful and powerful testimony glorifying God's work amongst the poor and destitute of Hong Kong. Hear the wonders of His love as He turns gangsters, drug addicts and prostitutes to Himself through this ministry He's placed on her heart.

sermons.title: Testimony - Part 10
sermons.description: A beautiful and powerful testimony glorifying God's work amongst the poor and destitute of Hong Kong. Hear the wonders of His love as He turns gangsters, drug addicts and prostitutes to Himself through this ministry He's placed on her heart.

sermons.title: Testimony and Challenge
sermons.description: A marvelous testimony of God's power through a woman who had committed her life to her Saviour. From the 1930's to 1940's, the Lord led her to face WWII and communism in Northern China, where she saved over a 100 orphans. After China fell to the communists, the Lord led her to the islands of Hong Kong and Taiwan, where the love He put in her heart for the Chinese and lost children continued until her death in 1970. Through her stories, she encourages all believers to completely give their entire beings to God and see what He can do with such a life entrusted to Him.

sermons.title: Testimony of Jesus - Present Testimony - Part I
Testimony of Jesus - Present Testimony - Part II
Testimony of Jesus - Reality of the Testimony
Testimony of Jesus - Reality of the Testimony
Testimony of Jesus - Search for the Testimony
Testimony of Jesus - Vessel of the Testimony
Testimony of the Goodness of the Lord
The 1st Vision: The Testimony of Jesus
The Greatest Event Of My Life
Wandering Jew Comes Home
sermons.description: Art Katz shares his testimony in a Kathryn Kuhlman crusade or gathering. This is an older recording and Katz is just beginning his ministry to the 2.5 million Jews in New York City. This testimony is very powerful and really shows the working of divine truth in a soul of a man.

sermons.title: Why a Personal Testimony?
sermons.description: Why a public personal testimony? Share it to give evidence, and bear an honest report of God working in you life. The Apostle Paul often shared his personal testimony. A right testimony doesn’t glorify us. It influences and convicts others, and keeps us from cooling off spiritually. Let the Lord Jesus Christ be glorified in your life through a personal testimony.
